import React from 'react' import Router from 'next/router' import { MdMailOutline } from 'react-icons/md' import { TiArrowBack } from 'react-icons/ti' const Comments = ({comments}) => { const list = comments.map((comment) =>

{comment.name}

{comment.body}

{comment.email}
); return (
{list}
Router.push({ pathname: '/index'})}> Return to posts
) } export default Comments
